summary: Tested all new features from iteration 9: README.md, AboutPage with tabs, mosque history text, highlight cards, Gallery page, and Admin Identity with description/profile image. All 9 backend tests pass. All frontend features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/mosque/identity returns description and profile_image_url fields
Backend: PUT /api/mosque/identity updates description correctly
Backend: PUT /api/mosque/identity updates profile_image_url correctly
Backend: /api/gallery returns gallery items
Backend: /api/articles returns articles for Informasi tab
Backend: /api/announcements returns announcements for Informasi tab
Backend: /api/pengurus returns pengurus for Informasi tab
Backend: /api/health returns status=healthy
Backend: README.md exists at /app/README.md with proper content
Frontend: AboutPage loads with data-testid='about-page'
Frontend: AboutPage shows mosque history text with 1907, 1977
Frontend: AboutPage has 3 highlight cards: Didirikan 1907, Renovasi Besar 1977, Terbuka 24/7
Frontend: AboutPage has 3 tabs: Informasi, Donasi & Infaq, Kontak
Frontend: Tab Informasi shows Artikel, Pengumuman, Pengurus Takmir sections
Frontend: Tab Donasi shows QRIS image and bank account 7148254552
Frontend: Tab Kontak shows contact form and contact info (WhatsApp, address)
Frontend: Gallery page at /homepage/gallery loads correctly
Frontend: Gallery link from AboutPage points to /homepage/gallery
Frontend: Admin Identity page has description textarea (data-testid='mosque-description-input')
Frontend: Admin Identity page has profile image upload (data-testid='profile-image-upload-input')
Frontend: Mobile navigation works with burger menu showing all nav links
Frontend: Admin login with data-testid selectors works correctly
critical_code_review_comments: AboutPage correctly uses mosqueIdentity.description from API with fallback to DEFAULT_HISTORY
MosqueIdentity model properly includes description and profile_image_url fields
IdentityPage admin page correctly shows Profil & Sejarah section with textarea and image upload
GalleryPage properly implements lightbox with navigation controls
Tab components correctly use shadcn/ui Tabs with data-testid attributes for testing
README.md has comprehensive documentation for GitHub deployment
seed_data_creation: Existing seed data: Articles, Pengumuman, Pengurus, Gallery items present in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 9 features complete: 1) README.md at /app/README.md with deployment docs, 2) AboutPage completely rewritten with Tabs (Informasi, Donasi & Infaq, Kontak), 3) Mosque history with Pangeran Diponegoro story (uses mosqueIdentity.description or DEFAULT_HISTORY fallback), 4) Highlight cards show 1907/1977/24/7, 5) GalleryPage at /homepage/gallery with lightbox, 6) Admin IdentityPage has description textarea and profile_image_url upload. Login uses data-testid selectors: login-username, login-password, login-submit. After login, redirects to /connect/dashboard.
